sentences.en: Awa can just move unwieldy overweight small noodle boy.
sentences.cn: 可阿波只是个体重超重动作笨拙的小面馆小伙计.

sentences.en: But how does one hold and control two very long and unwieldy sheets of foam?
sentences.cn: 但如何一持有和控制的两个很长的和笨重的张泡沫?

sentences.en: He lowed his head in shame, his cumbersome face burning . His fingers felt gross and unwieldy.
sentences.cn: 他不好意思地低下了头, 臃肿的脸上火辣辣的,他的手指都变得笨重不灵,不听使唤了.

sentences.en: It is too unwieldy for practical calculations.
sentences.cn: 它用于实际计算太麻烦了.

sentences.en: Large maps which must be unfolded are unwieldy to use in the field.
sentences.cn: 不能折叠的大型图纸在野外使用是很不方便的.

sentences.en: OK, the bed may be too unwieldy or expensive to replace.
sentences.cn: 好吧, 换张床可能太费事或太贵了.

sentences.en: One, such as a person or an object, that is bulky, clumsy, or unwieldy.
sentences.cn: 大个子, 庞然大物庞大 、 笨拙或不灵便的(人或物体)

sentences.en: Otherwise, he says, the union will be too unwieldy.
sentences.cn: 否则, 他说, 组织会更加的难以控制.

sentences.en: Since the detailed expression is somewhat unwieldy we present it here in its general form.
sentences.cn: 由于详细表达有点不实用,我们在这里提出了它的一般形式.

sentences.en: The company is an unwieldy organization.
sentences.cn: 这个公司的办事机构庞大.

sentences.en: They came panting up to his door with their unwieldy baggage.
sentences.cn: 他们提着笨重的行李气喘吁吁地来到他门口。
这种方法是很难实行的.

sentences.en: This can get to be unwieldy pretty quickly.
sentences.cn: 这个办法很快就会显出其笨重之处.

sentences.en: This machine is too unwieldy to move.
sentences.cn: 这台机器太笨重了,很难搬动.

sentences.en: We set about towing the unwieldy structure into the shelter.
sentences.cn: 我们开始把这个笨重的东西拖进隐蔽处.

trans.tran_cn: 笨拙的，笨重的，不便利的
trans.tran_en: an unwieldy object is big, heavy, and difficult to carry or use
